description: Try our easy to follow Steak & Mushroom Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef pie,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Beef,Mushroom,Soy free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Steak & Mushroom Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spray oil onto a heavy based nonstick pot over high heat. Add steak and cook, stirring occasionally, until a brown crust forms, about 5-6 minutes.
Add veggie mix, mushrooms and rosemary and cook, stirring, for 45 minutes. Stir in tomato paste and Worcestershire sauce and cook for 1 minute.
Reduce heat to low and cook for 45 minutes or until beef is tender, stirring occasionally (add 1/2 cup water in between if necessary to stop from sticking).

Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Lightly spray a rectangular or square baking dish (approximately 24cm) with oil. Layer 2 sheets of filo pastry with spray oil in between. Lay across the prepared dish vertically. Repeat with another 2 sheets of filo and lay across the baking dish horizontally. Add beef mixture and fold pastry sides in to cover the beef. Spray 4 sheets of filo with oil, scrunch each sheet and cover the top of the pie. Bake for 20 minutes or until pastry is golden.
